char_248_mgllan.name: Magallan
desc: Complete 5 operations and summon Magallan's summoned units at least 5 times in each operation (Magallan cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 2-5 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Magallan must be deployed during the operation and only Vanguard operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_336_folivo.name: Scene
desc: Complete 5 operations and summon Scene's summoned units at least 5 times in each operation (Scene cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 3-1 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Scene must be deployed during the operation and only Sniper operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_242_otter.name: Mayer
desc: Complete 5 operations and summon Mayer's summoned units at least 5 times in each operation (Mayer cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 2-9 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 3 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Mayer must be deployed during the operation and only Sniper operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_110_deepcl.name: Deepcolor
desc: Summon a total of 20 summoned units with Deepcolor (Deepcolor cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 2-4 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 1 unit; only a non-Support Deepcolor may be in the squad

char_485_pallas.name: Pallas
desc: Defeat a total of 50 enemies with Pallas (Pallas cannot be a Support Unit)

Clear Main Theme 3-6 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Pallas must be deployed during the operation and only Medic operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_265_sophia.name: Whislash
desc: Defeat a total of 50 enemies with Whislash (Whislash cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme S3-6 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Whislash must be deployed during the operation and only Defender operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_308_swire.name: Swire
desc: Clear 5 operations with Swire (Swire cannot be a Support Unit); only Guard operators are allowed for the remaining units

Clear Main Theme S2-3 with a 3-star rating using a squad of at most 2 units (including Support Units); a non-Support Swire must be deployed during the operation and only Melee operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_130_doberm.name: Dobermann
desc: Clear 5 operations with Dobermann (Dobermann cannot be a Support Unit); only 3-star operators are allowed for the remaining units
Clear Main Theme 1-12 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Dobermann must be deployed during the operation and only 3-star operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_430_fartth.name: Fartooth
desc: Defeat a total of 80 enemies with Fartooth (Fartooth cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme S2-2 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Fartooth must be deployed during the operation, and Fartooth must defeat at least 8 enemies with Feathershine Arrows

char_158_milu.name: Firewatch
desc: Defeat a total of 25 enemy ranged units with Firewatch (Firewatch cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 2-10 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Firewatch must be deployed during the operation, and Firewatch must defeat Skullshatterer

char_218_cuttle.name: Andreana
desc: Deal a total of 150,000 damage with Andreana (Andreana cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 3-2 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Andreana must be deployed during the operation, and Andreana must defeat at least 15 enemies

char_302_glaze.name: Ambriel
desc: Defeat a total of 30 enemies with Ambriel's Radar Sweep (Ambriel cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 4-7 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Ambriel must be deployed during the operation, and Ambriel must defeat at least 6 Infused Originium Slugs

char_179_cgbird.name: Nightingale
desc: Summon a total of 10 summoned units with Nightingale (Nightingale cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 3-6 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Nightingale must be deployed during the operation, and Nightingale must use Arts Shield 10 times

char_128_plosis.name: Ptilopsis
desc: During battle, have Ptilopsis use Enkephalin 8 times (Ptilopsis cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 4-9 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Ptilopsis must be deployed during the operation, and any other Medic Operators or Defender Operators are not allowed for the remaining units

char_275_breeze.name: Breeze
desc: During battle, have Breeze fire a total of 50 healing rounds (Breeze cannot be a Support Unit)
Clear Main Theme 4-1 with a 3-star rating; a non-Support Breeze must be deployed during the operation, and only 7 Operators are allowed for the remaining units

char_181_flower.name: Perfumer
desc: Complete a total of 5 battles; In each battle, a non-Support Perfumer must be deployed once at least
Clear Main Theme 3-4 with a 3-star rating; only a non-Support Perfumer is allowed as the only Medic Operator
